testsuite.name: tetris.GameOverTests

testcase.name: testGameOver

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: The game is over if the blocks of a newly spawned tetromino are already occupied -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=2, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..L. | .LL. LLL. | .L.. .... | .L.. .... | ....
step=1, rand=2, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .LL. ..L. | .L.. LLL. | .L.. .... | ....
step=2, rand=2, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .LL. .... | .L.. ..L. | .L.. LLL. | ....
step=3, rand=3, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .OO. | .LL. .OO. | .L.. ..L. | .L.. LLL. | ....
step=4, rand=4, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------------------- GameOverDisplay() | .LL. | .L.. | .L.. | ....

testcase.name: testNoEscapeGameOver

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: You cannot escape from a game over state by moving or rotating blocks. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=1, actions=<> Want | Got ✓ ------------ J... | J... JJJ. | JJJ. .... | ....
step=1, rand=1, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | J... J... | JJJ. JJJ. | ....
step=2, rand=1, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------------------- GameOverDisplay() | J... | JJJ. | ....
step=3, rand=1, actions=<Right> Want | Got ✗ ------------------------- GameOverDisplay() | J... | JJJ. | ....

testcase.name: testNoEscapeGameOver2

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: You cannot escape from a game over state by moving or rotating blocks. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=1, actions=<> Want | Got ✓ ------------ J... | J... JJJ. | JJJ. .... | .... .... | ....
step=1, rand=1, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✓ ------------ .JJ. | .JJ. .J.. | .J.. .J.. | .J.. .... | ....
step=2, rand=1, actions=<Left> Want | Got ✗ ------------ JJ.. | .JJ. J... | .J.. J... | .J.. .... | ....
step=3, rand=1, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .JJ. JJ.. | .J.. J... | .J.. J... | ....
step=4, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------------------- GameOverDisplay() | .JJ. | .J.. | .J.. | ....
step=5, rand=0, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------------------- GameOverDisplay() | .... | JJJ. | ..J. | ....
